title: Homeopathy | Mysite
cleaned_text: Homeopathy Homeopathy is an effective system of medicine that has been used for over 200 years to support people's health concerns. Homeopathic medicines are prepared from natural substances that are non-toxic and can be safely given to infants, children, and adults. They do not interfere with prescription medications, but can be given along with them. When prescribing a homeopathic medicine we recognize each person's illness manifests in a unique way. If two patients present with the same illness, they will not necessarily get the same homeopathic remedy. If someone has a cold with a runny nose and watery eyes they would get a different remedy then a cold sufferer a stuffy nose and dry eyes. Our prescription of a homeopathic remedy matches a patients unique symptoms including the mental, physical, and emotional ones. Homeopathy was developed by the German physician Samuel Hahnemann (1755-1843) and quickly spread throughout Europe and worldwide. With over 200 years of clinical experience and numerous peer-reviewed basic science and clinical studies confirm homeopathy's ability to be a safe, effective, and powerful medicine.
